rose.name: Rose
rose.origin: Europe, Asia, North Africa, North America
rose.funfact1: For hundreds of years the rose has been widely recognized as a symbol of love, sympathy or sorrow.
rose.funfact2: The rose can come in all colors although a black rose is not actually black, it is usually a dark red.

sunflower.name: Sunflower
sunflower.ancientNameMeaning: Helios is Greek for sun, and anthos is Greek for flower

daisy.name: Common Daisy
daisy.ancientNameMeaning: Bellis is Latin for pretty and perennis is Latin for everlasting
daisy.origin: Europe, Asia, North Africa, North America

forget-me-not.name: Forget-me-not
forget-me-not.origin: Western Eurasia, New Zealand, Americas, Europe
